Rummel MJ
Knauf W
Goener M
Two years rituximab maintenance vs. observation after first line treatment with bendamustine plus rituximab (B-R) in patients with mantle cell lymphoma: first results of a prospective, randomized, multi-center phase II study (a subgroup study of the StiL NHL7-2008 MAINTAIN trial). J Clin Oncol. 2016; 34( 15_suppl): 7503.
